# Auto-generated by tools/generate_building_hooks.py
# INJECT blocks: manage location tracking list on build/destroy

# adm_vatican_library uses library_maintenance
INJECT:adm_vatican_library = {
	on_built = {
		location = { add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:adm_vatican_library } }
		epbm_on_building_built = yes
	}
	on_destroyed = {
		location = { remove_list_variable = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:adm_vatican_library } }
		epbm_on_building_destroyed = yes
	}
}

		epbm_on_building_built = yes
	}
	on_destroyed = {
		location = { remove_list_variable = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:darussifa } }
		epbm_on_building_destroyed = yes
	}
}

	}
	on_destroyed = {
		location = { remove_list_variable = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:jurchen_barracks } }
		epbm_on_building_destroyed = yes
	}
}

INJECT:pirate_tavern = {
	on_built = {
		location = { add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:pirate_tavern } }
		epbm_on_building_built = yes
	}
	on_destroyed = {
		location = { remove_list_variable = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:pirate_tavern } }
		epbm_on_building_destroyed = yes
	}
}

INJECT:terraces = {
	on_built = {
		location = { add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:terraces } }
		epbm_on_building_built = yes
	}
	on_destroyed = {
		location = { remove_list_variable = { name = epbm_building_types target = building_type:terraces } }
		epbm_on_building_destroyed = yes
	}
}
